overview:
Fred Beckley is an established legal practitioner in the telecommunications industry. He comes to TruePosition from Verizon (formerly Bell Atlantic Corporation) where he served as a leading member of their mergers and acquisitions team. Previously, he was general counsel for Bell Atlantic’s Groupo Iusacell, the second largest wireless company in Mexico, and acted as general counsel for Bell Atlantic Professional Services, Inc.

Mr. Beckley received his Juris Doctorate from Yale Law School and earned a Bachelor of Arts in medieval European history from the University of Pennsylvania.
